file_content.text:
ERROR: SYSTEM FAILURE--DATA CORRUPTED--ENCRYPTION UNSECURED!
House Rist has successfully assassinated major Thul military leaders and political allies of the Empire. Their intelligence is key to their success. Your mission is to infiltrate House Rist, recover and destroy target lists from known Rist assassins, and wipe their central intel database.
Be warned: House Rist does not leave their home unprotected. Maintain cover identity at all times. After you have successfully wiped the Rist database, transmit confirmation using Imperial codes (provided.) For your own protection, destroy this communication upon receipt.
END OF RECOVERED DATA--POWER FAILURE--SYSTEM REBOOTING NOW
